segments.text: I see the water overflowing, creating a little river on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually kind of mesmerizing, the way it flows and spreads out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so calm, like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried watching him balance like that, it looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit envious of their bravery and determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's like a little oasis out there.
segments.speaker: PAR
